summary: This appears to be a forwarded email or note referencing a news article from the Atlanta Jewish Times/Times of Israel reporting that Jeffrey Epstein consulted with an Atlanta attorney days before his death. The document is minimal, consisting primarily of metadata and a link to the article.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the news article referenced in the email, which reports he consulted an attorney before his death.

events.title: Article Publication on Epstein's Pre-Death Consultation
events.description: A news article is published reporting that Jeffrey Epstein consulted with an Atlanta attorney days before his death.

keyFacts: The document references a news article from the Atlanta Jewish Times/Times of Israel.
The article's subject is that Jeffrey Epstein consulted with an Atlanta attorney shortly before his death.
The document itself is an email or note sent from an iPhone on December 30, 2019.
